name: inFeedo AI
headline: AI to engage employees, predict attrition and automate HR/IT support
description:
In 2016, we set out on a mission to make 100 million employees heard and valued. Today we’re Asia’s leading employee experience platform that helps engage employees, predict attrition & answer FAQs with conversational AI that people love ❤️ 

From India’s Shark Tank to Tiger Global. We’re backed by Y Combinator, Bling Capital and founders of Gainsight, Freshworks, Zeta, Lenskart, innov8. As a Chief Listening Officer, our A.I. bot Amber helps people-first leaders find hidden gaps in their culture, managers and wellbeing in real time. Spanning across 60 countries, our customers include MNCs like Samsung, Xiaomi, Lenovo, conglomerates like TATA, Godrej, Bharti.

Come join our mission to help build cultures where people love to come to work. For career opportunities, please visit our careers page: jobs.infeedo.com
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:hr-tech; industry:enterprise-software; industry:ai; location:new-york

founders.name: Tanmaya Jain, Founder
founders.description: I believe that mental health + cancer are silent epidemics that are gradually consuming mankind. As I climb up Maslow's hierarchy, the idea is to dedicate a major portion of my life to these 2 causes.

founders.name: Varun Puri, Founder
founders.description:
► Co-Founder + CPO + CTO at Amber by inFeedo
► I build things. I experiment. I want to be a teacher someday.
► I run Product + Design + Engineering at inFeedo.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: inFeedo AI**

Founded in 2016, **inFeedo AI** emerged from a simple yet ambitious mission: to give 100 million employees a voice and affirm their value in the workplace. Fast forward to today, and inFeedo has become Asia’s leading employee experience platform. Their innovative approach leverages conversational AI—specifically their flagship product, **Amber**, an AI-driven "Chief Listening Officer"—to enhance employee engagement, predict attrition, and streamline HR operations.

**Mission and Impact**  
InFeedo's mission is straightforward: empower employees and improve workplace culture. Their platform reaches across 60 countries, facilitating meaningful interactions for organizations large and small, ranging from MNCs like **Samsung, Xiaomi, and Lenovo**, to conglomerates such as **TATA** and **Godrej**.

**Funding and Growth**  
HinFeedo is backed by notable investors including **Y Combinator**, **Tiger Global**, and prominent founders from successful startups like **Freshworks** and **Gainsight**. Being part of the **Y Combinator Batch S20** has played a crucial role in their growth journey. With a team of approximately 150, they’re poised for even greater impact in the HR tech space.

**Innovative Solutions**  
The core of inFeedo's offering is built around several solutions that provide comprehensive employee experience management:

- **Continuous Listening**: Utilize automated feedback mechanisms to gauge employee sentiments in real-time.
- **AI-Powered Surveys**: Conduct pulse surveys that gather actionable insights.
- **Amber**: The conversational AI that listens to and analyzes employee feedback, enabling organizations to take immediate action.
- **Employee Support**: Automated responses to common HR and IT queries, liberating HR teams from repetitive tasks.
- **Analytics and Reports**: Leverage AI to generate insights on employee engagement and wellbeing, helping leaders to connect with at-risk employees.

**The Vision Forward**  
inFeedo is creating a future where employee voice is not just heard but acted upon. They envision workplaces where people love to come to work, fostering cultures of feedback and continuous improvement. For those interested in contributing to this mission, inFeedo actively invites applicants to explore career opportunities on their [employment page](https://jobs.infeedo.com).

**Website**: For more information about inFeedo AI and their pioneering solutions, visit their website at [infeedo.ai](https://infeedo.ai).

In summary, inFeedo AI embodies an ambitious blend of technology and human insight, aimed at transforming the employee experience landscape and building better workplace cultures globally.
